channel.title: Honest opinions on 07?
channel.description:
Hey guys, figured i'd start a good quality discussion thread on a probably overly recycled question, but what are your guys' opinion on 07 scape at this point in time?
My personal opinion is 50/50 to be honest. the /50 on the bad side comes mainly from lack of community, and other small things. Personally I would have liked to have seen classic varrock, along with the parchment chat box, and even the old game frame in general. I sorta hated at first starting from scratch but then realized that's the point to get that old feel back. How about you guys?

item.title: Honest opinions on 07?
item.dc:creator: @Hyperon Hyperon
item.description:
@Hyperon wrote:

stCky:

Nothing else we can do for what we want other than do it ourselves.

Greatness can only come from those wise to this.

Read full topic

item.title: Honest opinions on 07?
item.dc:creator: @stCky stCky
item.description:
@stCky wrote:

The community giveth and the community taketh. Nothing else we can do for what we want other than do it ourselves. It’s always been like that though so maybe fucking with RSPS is just how it was meant to be…I ain’t complaining then

Read full topic

item.title: Honest opinions on 07?
item.dc:creator: @Hyperon Hyperon
item.description:
@Hyperon wrote:

I am speaking for myself, yes. I have long since learned that nostalgia is a chemical in my mind that cannot be relived. The damage is done and I have just been stuck in the RSPS loop now since 2006 trying to relive it, until only recently realising I’ll be forever chasing it.

But I still enjoy RSPS, so I continue to do it until it dies or changes dramatially. It’s the next best thing and I don’t personally support Jagex anymore because they don’t support me.

Read full topic

item.title: Honest opinions on 07?
item.dc:creator: @stCky stCky
item.description:
@stCky wrote:

[quote=“Hyperon, post:15, topic:548335”][quote author=stCky link=topic=667240.msg4462191#msg4462191 date=1418086107]
Everyone complaining about what they’ve added in would be the same people complaining if it was 100% as it was in 2007 imo
[/quote]
I wouldn’t complain. All those YouTube videos that players created each year petitioning. People were banging on for years how they wished RS stayed as it was in 2007 just like RSC was allowed to. Now it’s here it’s not how it was in 2007.

It’s not awful but it’s not what we (old schoolers) wanted. If only more people played RuneRebels then the world would be a better place.[/quote]

You’re speaking for yourself, not all “old schoolers”. I think what most people seem to think is they want the game 100% exactly like it was in 2007, when in reality they’re no doubt happy with many of the updates and would most likely be complaining or pushing for new content if the game was the exact same. There was private servers back then so obviously people were already wanting to change the game, add new content etc. The updates are community driven and there’ll always be people bitching either way. What I’m saying is I’m sure there’s at least one update in OSRS that wasn’t in 2007 and you like it.

The game would be stale and the nostalgia would have worn of much earlier if no updates were released, the game will (and is) go in a different direction to RS3 and is a good thing.

Read full topic

item.title: Honest opinions on 07?
item.dc:creator: @xFaceless xFaceless
item.description:
@xFaceless wrote:

[quote=“Hyperon, post:9, topic:548335”][quote author=xFaceless link=topic=667240.msg4462180#msg4462180 date=1418083682]

But it’s a new community. It’s the 2014 community voting not the original from 7-8 years ago. That’s why they would vote on something that someone like me wouldn’t vote on. Give or take a few exceptions of course.

This is so true though, I have a bad feeling Oldschool will end up like RS3 with 07 graphics in a way.
[/quote]
Or they’ll vote for HD full screen and it will get added. Isn’t there already GE? Rs2 wasn’t broken, so why fix it? The players online in 2007 and players online now speaks for itself.

It will never be the same whilst Jagex are running the show, in my eyes.[/quote]

I just wish the community was like it was, I find it sad as soon as I see someone im just like omfg another person hi! the only time I feel the community is somewhat like it was when I walk through W1 Vwest.

Read full topic

item.title: Honest opinions on 07?
item.dc:creator: @stCky stCky
item.description:
@stCky wrote:

I played for a little bit, haven’t in the last few months. I enjoyed going back to the game being older, quests weren’t impossibly long, I made all my accounts quickly and efficiently etc. Back in the day it’d take me months to build up a pure with desert treasure and decent pk stats, but found I was a lot less sloppy with my time spent now. No idea what the recent updates have been, just get rid of the red !'s that come up so I can scam people with my obby capes (y)

Read full topic

item.title: Honest opinions on 07?
item.dc:creator: @ox_random_xi ox random xi
item.description:
@ox_random_xi wrote:

[quote=“HcoJustin, post:3, topic:548335”][quote author=Hyperon link=topic=667240.msg4462128#msg4462128 date=1418068554]
I haven’t played it but followed a few YouTube videos for a while. I longed for old school to come back since the day it got taken away. Now it’s here it’s not old school. It has overloads and other things that I’m unfamiliar with which just puts me off.

Private servers are all I have left.
[/quote]
Those were all community driven updates. While I agree it doesn’t hit the nostalgia factor anymore, the community is taking the game in a direction they want[/quote]which is what we always wanted I guess, but I dislike playing it because of all the ‘customs’ they’ve added. Yeah, it’s community driven, but sometimes the community doesn’t know what it wants.

Read full topic
